marytts.signalproc.analysis

Class SPTKPitchReaderWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • marytts.signalproc.analysis.SPTKPitchReaderWriter

  • public class SPTKPitchReaderWriter
extends Object
    File I/O for binary SPTK pitch contour files
    Author:
    Sathish Pammi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SPTKPitchReaderWriter(double[] contour, PitchFileHeader header)
      create a SPTK Pitch reader writer with external contour
      SPTKPitchReaderWriter(String lf0SPTKFile)
      read a SPTK lf0 file with following default values windowSizeInSeconds = 0.005f; skipSizeInSeconds = 0.005f; fs = 16000; // in Hz
      SPTKPitchReaderWriter(String lf0SPTKFile, float windowSizeInSeconds, float skipSizeInSeconds, int samplingRate)
      read a SPTK lf0 file with external settings
